buttonDefaultTitle.description: Hover on the Talkie button, dynamically set.
buttonDefaultTitle.message: Soma uteuzi wa maandishi kwa sauti na $NAME$
buttonDefaultTitle.original: Read text selection out loud with $NAME$

buttonDefaultTitle_Static.description: Hover on the Talkie button, set from manifest.json.
buttonDefaultTitle_Static.message: Soma uteuzi wa maandishi kwa sauti na Talkie
buttonDefaultTitle_Static.original: Read text selection out loud with Talkie

commandActionDescription.message: Soma uteuzi wa maandishi kwa sauti

commandOpenWebsiteUpgradeDescription.message: Pata toleo jipya la Talkie Premium

commandSpeakClipboardDescription.message: Ongea maandishi kutoka kwenye ubao wa kunakili

extensionDescription.description: For the browsers/web stores. Maximum 132 characters.
extensionDescription.message: Haraka na rahisi kutuma maandishi kwa usemi. Soma kwa sauti kutoka kwa tovuti, PDF, barua pepe. Kufahamu faragha, msimbo wa chanzo huria.
extensionDescription.original: Fast & easy text-to-speech. Read aloud from websites, PDF, email. Privacy-aware, open source code.

frontend_PopupUsageShort.message: Chagua maandishi unayotaka kwenye ukurasa wowote wa wavuti na ubofye Talkie kwenye upau wa vidhibiti wa kivinjari chako.
frontend_PopupUsageShort.original: Select desired text on any web page and click the Talkie button in your browser toolbar.

frontend_aboutIssuesOnGithubLinkText.message: Maombi ya kipengele na ripoti za hitilafu kwenye Github
frontend_aboutIssuesOnGithubLinkText.original: Feature requests and bug reports on Github

frontend_faq001A.message: Sauti zinatoka kwa mfumo wa uendeshaji (Windows, ChromeOS, macOS, Linux, nk) na kivinjari chako cha sasa (Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, Firefox, nk). Hii pia inamaanisha kuwa unaweza kupakua na kusakinisha sauti zozote ambazo ungependa kuwa nazo, washa upya kompyuta yako, na Talkie inapaswa kuzitambua kiotomatiki. Unaweza pia kujaribu kutumia kivinjari tofauti, kwani usaidizi wa sauti unaweza kutofautiana hata kwenye mfumo sawa.
frontend_faq001A.original: The voices come from both from the operating system (Windows, ChromeOS, macOS, Linux, etcetera) and your current browser (Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, Firefox, etcetera). This also means that you can download and install any voices you would like to have, reboot your computer, and Talkie should recognize them automatically. You can also try using a different browser, as voice support may differ even on the same system.

frontend_faq001Q.original: How does Talkie detect installed voices?

frontend_faq002A.message: Unaweza kuongeza sauti zaidi kutoka kwa Microsoft na wengine. Rahisi zaidi ni kuongeza lugha mpya katika mipangilio ya mfumo. Hakikisha pia umesakinisha sauti kwa lugha. Tazama maagizo tofauti ya ufungaji.
frontend_faq002A.original: You can add more voices from both Microsoft and others. The easiest is to add a new language in the system settings. Make sure you also install the voice for the language. See separate installation instructions.

frontend_faq002Q.message: Ninawezaje kusakinisha sauti zaidi katika Talkie kwenye Microsoft Windows?
frontend_faq002Q.original: How can I install more voices in Talkie on Microsoft Windows?

frontend_faq003A.message: Unaweza kusakinisha kwa urahisi sauti na lugha za ziada katika mipangilio ya mfumo. Sauti za ChromeOS zinaweza pia kupatikana katika Duka la Chrome kwenye Wavuti.
frontend_faq003A.original: You can easily install additional voices and language in the system settings. Voices for ChromeOS may also be available in the Chrome Web Store.

frontend_faq003Q.message: Ninawezaje kusakinisha sauti zaidi katika Talkie kwenye Google ChromeOS?
frontend_faq003Q.original: How can I install more voices in Talkie on Google ChromeOS?

frontend_faq004A.message: Sauti za ziada zinaweza kusanikishwa kwa urahisi kutoka kwa mapendeleo ya mfumo wa macOS kwa hotuba. Tazama maagizo tofauti ya ufungaji.
frontend_faq004A.original: Additional voices can be easily installed from the macOS system preferences for speech. See separate installation instructions.

frontend_faq004Q.message: Ninawezaje kusakinisha sauti zaidi katika Talkie kwenye Apple macOS?
frontend_faq004Q.original: How can I install more voices in Talkie on Apple macOS?

frontend_faq005A.message: Inategemea ni usambazaji gani wa Linux, kivinjari, na mfumo wa usambazaji wa kifurushi unaotumia. Tazama maagizo tofauti ya usakinishaji kwa mchanganyiko wako wa programu. Rahisi zaidi inaweza kuwa kujaribu kivinjari kingine na kuona ikiwa kina sauti inayofaa iliyosakinishwa mapema. Kwa mfano, Firefox v130 kwenye Ubuntu 24.04 iliyosakinishwa kwa kutumia Snap inajumuisha sauti 13000+ za eSpeak zinazowezesha lugha 100+ katika lahaja 100+ — lakini sauti hizi zote ni za ubora wa chini. Kwa kulinganisha, Google Chrome v129 kwenye Ubuntu 24.04 iliyosakinishwa kwa kutumia Apt inajumuisha sauti 19 zinazowezesha lugha 14 katika lahaja 18 — zote zikiwa na ubora wa juu.
frontend_faq005A.original: It depends on which Linux distribution, browser, and package distribution system you use. See separate installation instructions for your combination of software. The easiest might be to try another browser and see if it has a suitable voice preinstalled. For example, Firefox v130 on Ubuntu 24.04 installed using Snap includes 13000+ eSpeak voices enabling 100+ languages in 100+ dialects — but all these voices are of low quality. In comparison, Google Chrome v129 on Ubuntu 24.04 installed using Apt includes 19 voices enabling 14 languages in 18 dialects — all with high quality.

frontend_faq005Q.message: Ninawezaje kusakinisha sauti zaidi katika Talkie kwenye Linux?
frontend_faq005Q.original: How can I install more voices in Talkie on Linux?

frontend_faq006A.message: Ndiyo na hapana. Talkie haijumuishi sauti zozote yenyewe, lakini hutumia sauti ambazo tayari zimesakinishwa kwenye kompyuta yako. Unaweza kusakinisha sauti zozote za ziada ambazo ungependa.
frontend_faq006A.original: Yes and no. Talkie does not include any voices in itself, but uses the voices which are already installed on your computer. You can install any additional voices you would like.

frontend_faq006Q.message: Je, unaweza kuongeza usaidizi kwa <a new voice> katika Talkie ?
frontend_faq006Q.original: Can you add support for <a new voice> in Talkie?

frontend_faq007A.message: Ndiyo na hapana. Kama Talkie hutumia sauti ambazo zimesakinishwa kwenye kompyuta yako, unahitaji kusakinisha sauti mpya inayoauni lugha ambayo ungependa kutumia.
frontend_faq007A.original: Yes and no. As Talkie uses the voices which are installed on your computer, you need to install a new voice which supports the language you would like to use.

frontend_faq007Q.message: Je, unaweza kuongeza usaidizi kwa <a new language> katika Talkie ?
frontend_faq007Q.original: Can you add support for <a new language> in Talkie?

frontend_faq008A.message: Ndiyo, ikiwa sauti zilizosakinishwa zinapatikana pia nje ya mtandao. Unaweza kuona katika orodha ya sauti ambazo zimewekwa alama mtandaoni.
frontend_faq008A.original: Yes, if the voices installed are also available offline. You can see in the list of voices which are marked as online.

frontend_faq008Q.message: Je Talkie kazi nje ya mtandao?

frontend_faq009A.message: Hapana, Talkie Premium ina sauti sawa na Talkie. Unaweza kusakinisha sauti zaidi kwenye mfumo wako, na zinapatikana kwa usawa. Katika Talkie Premium unaweza kubinafsisha sauti inayopendekezwa kwa kila lugha na lahaja ingawa.
frontend_faq009A.original: No, Talkie Premium has the exact same voices as Talkie. You can install more voices on your system, and they are equally available. In Talkie Premium you are able to customize the preferred voice per language and dialect though.

frontend_faq009Q.message: Je Talkie Premium ina sauti zaidi ya Talkie ?
frontend_faq009Q.original: Does Talkie Premium have more voices than Talkie?

frontend_faq010A.message: Google Chrome (na huenda vivinjari vingine vinavyotokana na Chromium) vimekuwa na tatizo/ hitilafu hii tangu angalau mwaka wa 2014. Talkie ina baadhi ya marekebisho, na chaguo la kuwezesha/kuzima maandishi ya usomaji katika sehemu fupi. Nitaendelea kuboresha utatuzi, lakini hadi timu ya Chromium ifanye kazi huenda isifanye kazi 100%. Ukikumbana na suala hili, tafadhali nijulishe ni kivinjari na toleo gani, mfumo wa uendeshaji na toleo, na lugha/sauti unayotumia.
frontend_faq010A.original: Google Chrome (and presumably other Chromium based browsers) have had this issue/bug since at least year 2014. Talkie has some workarounds in place, and an option to enable/disable reading text in shorter parts. I will continue to improve the workaround, but until the Chromium team works it might not work 100%. If you experience this issue, please let me know which browser and version, operating system and version, and language/voice you are using.

frontend_faq010Q.message: Kwa nini Talkie kusoma baada ya maneno 20-30 au sekunde chache?
frontend_faq010Q.original: Why does Talkie stop reading after 20-30 words or a few seconds?

frontend_faq011A.message: Kuna sababu mbili. Kwanza, ikiwa sauti inayotumika iko mtandaoni inahitaji kupakua faili ya hotuba kabla ya kuicheza. Hii ina maana ya kuongeza pause ambayo inategemea kasi yako ya muunganisho wa mtandao. Unaweza kuangalia ni sauti zipi ziko mtandaoni katika orodha ya sauti. Sababu ya pili ni kwamba njia ya kushughulikia matini ndefu hukata maandishi katika sehemu fupi, kwa kawaida kwa sentensi au kwa kila kifungu. Hii inaweza kuongeza pause ya ziada kwa kila pause. Unaweza kuwezesha kusoma maandishi marefu kama sehemu moja ya chaguo, ambayo inapaswa kuondoa kusitisha kwenye mifumo inayotumika.
frontend_faq011A.original: There are two reasons. Firstly, if the active voice is online it needs to download the speech file before playing it. This means an added pause which is depending on your internet connection speed. You can check which voices are online in the list of voices. The second reason is that the workaround for speaking long texts chops up the text in shorter parts, usually per sentence or per clause. This can add an extra pause for each pause. You can enable reading long texts as one part in the options, which should remove the pause on supported systems.

frontend_faq011Q.message: Kwa nini Talkie wakati fulani huwa na kusitisha kwa muda mrefu kati ya sentensi na maneno?
frontend_faq011Q.original: Why does Talkie sometime have a long pause between sentences and words?

frontend_faq012A.message: Kwa bahati mbaya, sio kikamilifu. Kwa watumiaji Talkie Premium inawezekana kunakili maandishi, na kuyazungumza kutoka kwenye ubao wa kunakili. Inabadilika kuwa Hati za Google (pamoja na Lahajedwali ya Google, Hifadhi ya Google, na sawa) sio tovuti, lakini "maombi maalum katika kivinjari" iliyoundwa na Google. Talkie haiwezi kufikia maandishi yaliyochaguliwa, wala kuongeza vipengee vya menyu ya muktadha, kwa hivyo kitufe cha Talkie hakifanyi kazi.
frontend_faq012A.original: Unfortunately, not fully. For Talkie Premium users it is possible to copy text, and speak it from the clipboard. It turns out that Google Docs (as well as Google Spreadsheet, Google Drive, and similar) is not a website, but a special "application in the browser" created by Google. Talkie cannot access the selected text, nor add context menu items, so the Talkie button does not work.

frontend_faq012Q.message: Je, Talkie kazi katika Hati za Google?
frontend_faq012Q.original: Does Talkie work in Google Docs?

frontend_faq013A.message: Ndiyo, tafadhali. Ikiwezekana kuunda ripoti ya suala kwenye Github, ili wengine waweze kusaidia pia. Tafadhali jumuisha maelezo mengi iwezekanavyo, kama vile kivinjari na toleo gani, mfumo wa uendeshaji na toleo, na lugha/sauti unayotumia. Pia jumuisha maelezo kuhusu tovuti maalum ambapo unaona hitilafu, ikiwezekana kwa kiungo.
frontend_faq013A.original: Yes, please. Preferably create an issue report on Github, so others can help out as well. Please include as much information as possible, such as which browser and version, operating system and version, and language/voice you are using. Also include information regarding specific websites where you see the bug, preferably with a link.

frontend_faq014A.message: Ndiyo, mara nyingi. Ikiwa unaweza kuchagua maandishi katika PDF, bofya kulia juu yake na uchague Talkie kwenye menyu. Watumiaji Talkie Premium wanaweza pia kunakili maandishi, kisha wayasome kutoka kwenye ubao wa kunakili. Ikiwa maandishi hayawezi kuchaguliwa, kama vile ni sehemu ya picha, basi haitafanya kazi.
frontend_faq014A.original: Yes, most of the time. If you can select the text in the PDF, right click on it and choose Talkie in the menu. Talkie Premium users can also copy the text, then read it from the clipboard. If the text cannot be selected, such as if it is part of an image, then it will not work.

frontend_faq014Q.message: Je, Talkie kusoma faili za PDF?

frontend_faq015A.message: Hapana. Talkie ina matumizi yasiyo na kikomo — unaweza kusoma maneno mengi na maandishi marefu upendavyo.
frontend_faq015A.original: No. Talkie has unlimited usage — you can read as many words and as long texts as you like.

frontend_faq015Q.message: Je Talkie ina kikomo cha maneno?
frontend_faq015Q.original: Does Talkie have a word limit?

frontend_faq016A.message: Ndiyo. Eleza kipengele unachotaka katika toleo jipya kwenye Github.
frontend_faq016A.original: Yes. Describe your desired feature in a new issue on Github.

frontend_faq017A.message: Kuna kihariri cha njia za mkato za Kibodi, ambacho unaweza kupata chini ya ukurasa wa Viendelezi katika Google Chrome.
frontend_faq017A.original: There is a Keyboard shortcuts editor, which you can find at the bottom of the Extensions page in Google Chrome.

frontend_faq017Q.message: Jinsi ya kubadilisha funguo za mkato kwenye Google Chrome?
frontend_faq017Q.original: How to change shortcut keys in Google Chrome?

frontend_faq018A.message: Unaweza kubadilisha au kuondoa vitufe vya njia za mkato katika mipangilio ya Firefox kwa Viongezi. Bofya kitufe cha cogwheel ili kupata kihariri cha ufunguo wa njia ya mkato.
frontend_faq018A.original: You can change or remove shortcut keys in Firefox settings for Add-Ons. Click the cogwheel button to find the shortcut key editor.

frontend_faq018Q.message: Jinsi ya kubadilisha funguo za mkato katika Firefox?
frontend_faq018Q.original: How to change shortcut keys in Firefox?

frontend_faq019A.message: Ndiyo, msaada daima unathaminiwa. Tafadhali tazama ukurasa wa mradi kwa maagizo.
frontend_faq019A.original: Yes, help is always appreciated. Please see the project page for instructions.

frontend_faq020A.message: Ndiyo — tafadhali waambie marafiki zako kuhusu Talkie. Labda tuma kiungo kwa mtu mashuhuri unayempenda kwenye mtandao, kikundi cha mtandaoni, au jarida. Unaweza hata kumwomba bosi wako aisakinishe kwenye kompyuta zote za kazini, au mwalimu wako aisakinishe shuleni. Kueneza habari kuhusu Talkie kunathaminiwa sana.
frontend_faq020A.original: Yes — please tell your friends about Talkie. Perhaps send a link to your favorite internet celebrity, online group, or newsletter. You can even ask your boss to install it on all the computers at work, or your teacher to install it at school. Spreading the word about Talkie is very much appreciated.

frontend_faq020Q.message: Je, ninaweza kusaidia Talkie kwa njia nyingine yoyote?
frontend_faq020Q.original: Can I help Talkie in any other way?

frontend_faq021A.message: Inachukua muda na juhudi nyingi kukuza na kudumisha Talkie — mamia ya saa hadi sasa. Hata hivyo, Talkie ni bure kwa kila mtu kutumia kadri apendavyo. Ili kusaidia kifedha zaidi maendeleo, matengenezo na kuweka Talkie malipo, baadhi ya vipengele vinapatikana kwa watumiaji wa Talkie Premium
frontend_faq021A.original: It takes quite a lot of time and effort to develop and maintain Talkie — hundreds of hours so far. Yet, Talkie is free for everyone to use as much as they like. To financially support further both development, maintenance and keeping the free Talkie free, some features are only available to Talkie Premium users.

frontend_faq021Q.message: Kwa nini kuna matoleo mawili ya Talkie ?
frontend_faq021Q.original: Why are there two editions of Talkie?

frontend_faq022A.message: Ndiyo, kuna chaguo nyingi za michango zinazopatikana.
frontend_faq022A.original: Yes, there are multiple donation options available.

frontend_faq022Q.message: Je, ninaweza kuchangia kwa kutumia PayPal, uhamisho wa benki, nk?
frontend_faq022Q.original: Can I donate using PayPal, bank transfer, etcetera?

frontend_faq023A.message: Ndiyo, ikiwa ulichanga kwa kutumia PayPal ambayo hutoa usimamizi rahisi wa kurejesha pesa. Urejeshaji wa pesa kwa ujumla haupatikani kwa mbinu zingine za michango kutokana na kiasi cha kazi ya ziada inayohitaji, pamoja na hatari kama vile kurejesha pesa kwa akaunti isiyo sahihi. Inapendeza kwamba watumiaji kwanza watumie muda kujaribu Talkie Premium , ili kuhakikisha kuwa kila kitu ni cha kuridhisha kabla ya kuchangia.
frontend_faq023A.original: Yes, if you donated using PayPal which offers simple refund management. Refunds are generally not available for other methods of donations due to the amount of extra work it requires, in addition to risks such as refunding to the wrong account. It is preferable that users first spend time trying out Talkie Premium, to ensure everything is satisfactory before donating.

frontend_faq024A.message: Hakika, hakuna tatizo. Washa tu uboreshaji Talkie Premium ili ujaribu.
frontend_faq024A.original: Sure, no problem. Just enable the Talkie Premium upgrade to try it out.

frontend_faq024Q.message: Je, ninaweza kujaribu Talkie Premium malipo?
frontend_faq024Q.original: Can I try out Talkie Premium for free?

frontend_faq025A.message: Hakuna tangazo, ukusanyaji wa data, au ufuatiliaji wa mtumiaji katika Talkie. Watumiaji wenye furaha wanaochangia Talkie Premium ndio uchumaji wa mapato pekee.
frontend_faq025A.original: There is no advertisement, data collection, or user tracking in Talkie. Happy users donating for Talkie Premium is the only monetization.

frontend_faq025Q.message: Je, Talkie vina tangazo, kukusanya data au kufuatilia watumiaji?
frontend_faq025Q.original: Does the Talkie extensions contain advertisement, collect data, or track users?

frontend_faq026A.message: Mfumo wa heshima ni wakati watu wanaaminiana kufuata miongozo iliyokubaliwa, bila ukaguzi wa kutekelezwa. Kwa Talkie Premium hii inamaanisha kuamini kwamba wale wanaoboresha wamechangia pia.
frontend_faq026A.original: The honor system is when individuals trust each other to adhere to agreed upon guidelines, without strictly enforced checks. For Talkie Premium this means trusting that those who upgrade have also donated.

frontend_faq027A.message: Kwa sababu watu kote ulimwenguni hutumia sarafu tofauti, wana viwango tofauti vya mapato yanayoweza kutumika, na wana viwango tofauti vya kuthamini vipengele vya Talkie Premium. Hakuna bei moja, isiyobadilika ambayo inafanya kazi vizuri kwa kila mtu ulimwenguni. Zaidi ya hayo kunakuja mabadiliko ya sarafu, mitindo ya mzunguko wa uchumi, tofauti za kikanda/ndani ya nchi, nk. Yote kwa yote, mipangilio ya bei ya bidhaa inayouzwa ulimwenguni kote ni ngumu. Ni rahisi kuruhusu kila mtu kujiwekea bei, na kuhakikisha kuwa bidhaa hiyo ni nzuri vya kutosha kutoa mchango.
frontend_faq027A.original: Because people around the world use different currencies, have different levels of disposable income, and have different levels of appreciation for Talkie Premium's features. There is no single, fixed price that works well for everyone in the world. On top of that comes fluctuations in currencies, economic cycle trends, regional/intra-country variations, etcetera. All in all, settings prices for a product sold worldwide is complicated. It is easier to let everyone set their own price, and ensure that the product is good enough to warrant a donation.

frontend_faq027Q.message: Kwa nini naweza kuweka bei yangu mwenyewe?
frontend_faq027Q.original: Why can I set my own price?

frontend_faq028A.message: Kwa kuwa sijui ni pesa ngapi unazoweza na uko tayari kutumia kwenye programu ya kutuma maandishi-hadi-hotuba, ninapendelea uchangie kile unachofikiri Talkie Premium kinakufaa — sio zaidi, hata kidogo. Iwapo unatafuta sura ya marejeleo, wakati Duka la Google Chrome kwenye Wavuti liliposhughulikia malipo ya Talkie Premium (2017-2021) gharama ya usajili ya kila mwaka ilikuwa $25 (Dola ya Marekani) nchini Marekani. Bei za dunia nzima zilitofautiana ingawa Google ilirekebisha kiotomatiki bei za nchi na sarafu nyingine.
frontend_faq028A.original: Since I don't know how much money you are able and willing to spend on text-to-speech software, I prefer that you donate what you think Talkie Premium is worth to you — no more, no less. In case you are looking for a frame of reference, when Google Chrome Web Store handled payments for Talkie Premium (2017-2021) the yearly subscription cost was $$25 (US Dollar) in the United States of America. Worldwide prices varied though, as Google automatically adjusted prices for other countries and currencies.

frontend_faq028Q.original: How much do you recommend I donate?

frontend_faq029A.message: Kwa sababu kutekeleza mfumo wa malipo na uthibitishaji huchukua muda na juhudi nyingi. Inachukuliwa kuwa gharama ya kutekeleza uthibitishaji mkali wa malipo ni ya juu kuliko hasara kutoka kwa watu binafsi wanaodanganya mfumo. Uthibitishaji wa malipo pia unahitaji kiwango fulani cha ukusanyaji wa data kutoka kwa mifumo ya watumiaji, na watumiaji waliobobea kitaalamu wanaweza kufanyia kazi uthibitishaji hata hivyo. Kwa hivyo kutoka kwa mtazamo wa kiufundi na biashara, ingawa hakuna dhamana, ni rahisi kuamini tu kuwa watumiaji wanafuata mfumo wa heshima.
frontend_faq029A.original: Because implementing a system for payments and verification takes a lot of time and effort. It is assumed that the cost of implementing strict payment verification is higher than the losses from individuals cheating the system. Payment verification also requires some level of data collection from users' systems, and technically skilled users can often work around the verification anyways. So from a technical and business perspective, even though there are no guarantees, it is easier to simply trust that users adhere to the honor system.

frontend_faq029Q.message: Kwa nini hakuna mchango au uthibitishaji wa malipo?
frontend_faq029Q.original: Why is there no donation or payment verification?

frontend_faq030A.message: Ninagundua kuwa kuchangia "hakuna chochote" kunachanganya kidogo. Jibu fupi ni kwamba pesa sio kila kitu. Jibu refu lina vipengele zaidi. Uamuzi wa kutotekeleza uthibitishaji wa malipo unamaanisha kuwa kiasi kilicholipwa hakina umuhimu. Kwa kuongeza, gharama ya "kutengeneza" nakala ya dijiti ya Talkie Premium ni sifuri, kwa hivyo kuitoa bila malipo haimaanishi hasara ya kifedha kwa msanidi programu. Pia kuna matumaini kwamba ukipenda Talkie Premium utawaambia marafiki zako kuihusu, na pengine baadhi yao wakaishia kuchangia kwa njia moja au nyingine. Kutoa Talkie Premium kwa hivyo kunaweza kuonekana kama juhudi ya uuzaji.
frontend_faq030A.original: I realize that donating "nothing" is a bit confusing. The short answer is that money isn't everything. The long answer has more aspects. The decision to not implement payment verification means that the amount paid is irrelevant. In addition, the cost of "manufacturing" a digital copy of Talkie Premium is zero, so giving it away for nothing does not imply a financial loss for the developer. There is also the hope that if you like Talkie Premium you will tell your friends about it, and perhaps some of them end up donating in one way or another. Giving away Talkie Premium can therefore be seen as a marketing effort.

frontend_faq030Q.message: Kwa nini naweza kuchagua kuchangia au kulipa chochote?
frontend_faq030Q.original: Why can I choose to donate or pay nothing?

frontend_faq031A.message: Ndiyo, lakini hakuna mfumo otomatiki wa michango ya mara kwa mara. Njia iliyo wazi zaidi ni kwamba unachangia tena baadaye.
frontend_faq031A.original: Yes, but there is no automated system for recurring donations. The most straightforward way is that you simply donate again at a later time.

frontend_faq031Q.message: Je, ninaweza kutoa mchango unaorudiwa wa kila mwezi au mwaka?
frontend_faq031Q.original: Can I make a recurring monthly or yearly donation?

frontend_faq032A.message: Hili ni ombi adimu, na litahitaji kushughulikiwa kwa mikono. Tafadhali wasiliana kabla ya kuchangia.
frontend_faq032A.original: This is a rare request, and it would need to be handled manually. Please reach out before donating.

frontend_faq032Q.message: Je, ninaweza kupata risiti ya mchango wangu?
frontend_faq032Q.original: Can I get a receipt for my donation?

frontend_faq033A.message: Kwa sababu unapenda vipengele vya ziada Talkie Premium hutoa, na hisia ya furaha ya kuchangia uundaji wa programu huria na wasanidi huru. Kwa sababu ya gharama ya juu ya wakati wa ukuzaji na matengenezo, lakini sifuri ya gharama ya "kutengeneza" nakala za kidijitali, michango ya Talkie Premium inaweza pia kuonekana kama kutoa msaada na kutia moyo kwa maendeleo na matengenezo ya siku zijazo, kinyume na thamani ya bidhaa wakati huo. ya mchango.
frontend_faq033A.original: Because you like the additional features Talkie Premium provides, and the happy feeling of contributing to open source software development by independent developers. Due to relatively high time cost of development and maintenance, but zero cost of "manufacturing" digital copies, donations for Talkie Premium can also be seen as providing support and encouragement for future development and maintenance, as opposed to the value of the product at the time of donation.

frontend_faq033Q.original: Why should I donate to upgrade?

frontend_faq034A.message: Ndiyo, lakini inategemea kivinjari unachotumia. Kuna sauti za kisasa na sauti za zamani zinazopatikana katika Microsoft Windows. Nilipojaribu mara ya mwisho, sauti ya Kiholanzi "Microsoft Frank" ilipatikana katika Microsoft Edge, lakini si katika Google Chrome wala Mozilla Firefox. Sababu moja ni kwamba baadhi ya sauti zimeundwa kwa ajili ya mfumo mpya zaidi wa matamshi wa WinRT, na nyingine kwa Kiolesura cha zamani cha Utayarishaji wa Utumiaji wa Hotuba (SAPI). Kivinjari chako unachokipenda kinaweza kisiauni mifumo ya zamani na mpya ya matamshi, kumaanisha kuwa sauti ambayo kwa kweli imesakinishwa inaweza isiweze kutumika. Baada ya muda, vivinjari vingi vitaunga mkono mfumo mpya wa WinRT. Ikiwa unakosa sauti katika lugha yako, pendekezo moja ni kujaribu kutumia Talkie katika Microsoft Edge.
frontend_faq034A.original: Yes, but it depends on which browser you use. There are both modern voices and old voices available in Microsoft Windows. When I last tested, the Dutch voice "Microsoft Frank" was available in Microsoft Edge, but not in Google Chrome nor Mozilla Firefox. One reason is that some voices are built for the newer WinRT speech system, and some for the older Speech Application Programming Interface (SAPI). Your favorite browser may not support both the old and the new speech systems, meaning that a voice which is in fact installed may not be usable. Over time, most browsers will probably support the newer WinRT system. If you are missing voices in your language, one suggestion is to try using Talkie in Microsoft Edge.

frontend_faq034Q.message: Je, sauti zote za Microsoft Windows hufanya kazi na Talkie ?
frontend_faq034Q.original: Do all voices for Microsoft Windows work with Talkie?

frontend_faq035A.message: Pengine, kwa jitihada nyingi. Pia kuna baadhi ya njia zisizo rasmi za kupata sauti mpya za WinRT ili kufanya kazi na vivinjari vya zamani vilivyowezeshwa na SAPI, lakini hii ni jitihada ya kiufundi sana na haipendekezwi kwa watumiaji wasio wa kiufundi.
frontend_faq035A.original: Perhaps, with a lot of effort. There are also some unofficial workarounds to get new WinRT voices to work with older SAPI-enabled browsers, but this is a highly technical endeavor and not recommended for non-technical users.

frontend_faq035Q.message: Sauti za WinRT zinaweza kufanya kazi katika vivinjari vilivyowezeshwa na SAPI kwenye Microsoft Windows?
frontend_faq035Q.original: Can WinRT voices work in SAPI-enabled browsers on Microsoft Windows?

frontend_faq036A.message: Ndiyo, wengine wanafanya hivyo. Fuata maagizo ya usakinishaji wa mfumo wako na kivinjari. Mara sauti zinaposakinishwa kwenye kivinjari chako, Talkie inapaswa kuzitambua kiotomatiki.
frontend_faq036A.original: Yes, some do. Follow the installation instructions for your system and browser. Once the voices are installed in your browser, Talkie should detect them automatically.

frontend_faq036Q.message: Je, sauti za programu Talkie hufanya kazi na Talkie ?
frontend_faq036Q.original: Do open source voices work with Talkie?

frontend_faq037A.message: Michango inamaanisha matumizi ya hiari kwa kitu chanya. Fikiria kama takrima. Malipo yanamaanisha muamala wa lazima wa pesa.
frontend_faq037A.original: Donations imply voluntary spending on something positive. Think of it like gratuity. Payments imply a mandatory transaction of money.

frontend_faq037Q.message: Kwa nini michango badala ya malipo?

frontend_faq038A.message: Badala ya pesa, ueneze chanya. Kusaidia shirika la kibinadamu. Jitolee katika shirika la usaidizi la ndani. Msaidie mgeni. Mkumbatie mtu wa familia. Tabasamu. Kwa kweli, yote haya ni muhimu zaidi kuliko michango ya pesa kwa Talkie Premium. Ninashukuru kupokea postikadi ingawa.
frontend_faq038A.original: In lieu of money, spread positivity. Support a humanitarian organization. Volunteer at a local charity. Help a stranger. Hug a family member. Smile. In fact, all of these are more important than monetary donations for Talkie Premium. I do appreciate receiving postcards though.

frontend_faq038Q.message: Nilichagua kutoa chochote. Je, kuna kitu kingine ninachoweza kufanya?
frontend_faq038Q.original: I chose to donate nothing. Is there something else I can do?

frontend_faq039A.message: Ndiyo, unaweza kutumia Talkie Premium hata hivyo.
frontend_faq039A.original: Yes, you may use Talkie Premium anyways.

frontend_faq039Q.message: Ikiwa nilichagua kutochangia chochote, bado inahesabiwa?
frontend_faq039Q.original: If I chose to donate nothing, does it still count?

frontend_faq040A.message: Mpango asili ulikuwa kuchuma mapato Talkie kwa kutoza ada ya usajili ya kila mwaka kwa Talkie Premium. Kwa miaka michache (2017-2021) Duka la Google Chrome kwenye Wavuti lilishughulikia malipo na usajili wa Talkie Premium , lakini hawatoi huduma hiyo tena. Mfumo wa malipo wa nje ulipoacha kufanya kazi nilichagua kutenganisha vipengele Talkie Premium , ili kuashiria kuwa juhudi nyingi zimeingia Talkie. Michango ni kielelezo-ashirio kwamba watu hutumia na kuthamini Talkie , ambayo ndiyo imenitia moyo kutumia mamia ya saa kuishughulikia.
frontend_faq040A.original: The original plan was to monetize Talkie by charging a yearly subscription fee for Talkie Premium. For a few years (2017-2021) Google Chrome Web Store handled payments and subscriptions for Talkie Premium, but they no longer offer that service. When the external payment system stopped working I chose to keep Talkie Premium features separate, to indicate that a lot of effort has gone into Talkie. Donations are a proxy-indication that people use and appreciate Talkie, which is what has inspired me to spend hundreds of hours working on it.

frontend_faq040Q.message: Ikiwa michango ni ya hiari, kwa nini vipengele Talkie Premium vimetenganishwa?
frontend_faq040Q.original: If donations are optional, why are Talkie Premium features separate?

frontend_faq041A.message: Talkie , kama msimbo wangu mwingine wa chanzo huria, ni mradi wa hobby. Kwa kawaida kuna jambo dogo la kutunza kila baada ya wiki chache, kama vile kujibu maswali yaliyotumwa kwa barua pepe. Upangaji programu kwenye Talkie kwa kawaida huletwa kwa siku chache hapa na pale — mara nyingi wakati wa likizo na likizo. Kwa bahati mbaya, mabadiliko ya sera ya nje huchukua muda zaidi na zaidi kutoka kwa uundaji wa vipengele. Kwa mfano, uboreshaji wa kiufundi Talkie hadi Toleo la 3 la Dhihirisha (MV3) ulichukua wiki kadhaa za kazi (2023-2024) bila uboreshaji dhahiri wa manufaa ya Talkie .
frontend_faq041A.original: Talkie, like my other open source code, is a hobby project. There is usually something minor to take care of every few weeks, such as replying to emailed questions. Programming on Talkie is usually concentrated to a few days here and there — often during holidays and vacations. Unfortunately, external policy changes take more and more time from feature development. For example, technically upgrading Talkie to Manifest Version 3 (MV3) took several weeks of work (2023-2024) without apparent improvement to Talkie's usefulness.

frontend_faq041Q.message: Je, unatumia muda gani kufanya kazi kwenye Talkie ?
frontend_faq041Q.original: How much time do you spend working on Talkie?

frontend_faq042A.message: Kwa sasa sina uhakika. Nilitengeneza Talkie (2016) ili wengine wafurahie, na siitumii mimi mwenyewe. Kuongeza vipengele vipya na kujifunza mambo mapya ni jambo la kufurahisha. Kupokea maoni chanya na kuona idadi ya watumiaji ikiongezeka ni nzuri. Kwa sasa si hobby ninayopenda zaidi, kwa sababu mambo ya nje yamekuwa na athari mbaya kwa maendeleo katika miaka iliyopita (2020-2024). Hasa, uchapishaji wa kiendelezi cha wavuti unahitaji kusasishwa na sera zinazoendelea kubadilika za Google Chrome Web Store (CWS) na Mozilla Add-Ons (AMO) za Firefox.
frontend_faq042A.original: At the moment I am not sure. I developed Talkie (2016) for others to enjoy, and do not actually use it myself. Adding new features and learning new stuff is fun. Receiving positive feedback and seeing the number of users going up is nice. It is currently not my favorite hobby though, because external factors have had a negative impact on development during the past years (2020-2024). In particular, publishing a web extension requires staying up to date with the ever-evolving policies of Google Chrome Web Store (CWS) and Mozilla Add-Ons (AMO) for Firefox.

frontend_faq042Q.message: Je, utaendelea kufanyia kazi Talkie hadi lini?
frontend_faq042Q.original: How long will you keep working on Talkie?

frontend_faq043A.message: Jibu la swali hili haliwezi kusasishwa kwa uhakika. Tembelea Talkie tovuti kwa hali ya sasa ya mradi.
frontend_faq043A.original: The answer to this question cannot reliably be kept up to date. Visit the Talkie website for the current project status.

frontend_faq043Q.original: Are still you actively working on Talkie?

frontend_featuresEdition_Free.message: Kwa sasa unatumia toleo lisilolipishwa la Talkie , na seti ndogo ya vipengele inapatikana. Je, umefikiria kupata toleo jipya la Talkie Premium ?
frontend_featuresEdition_Free.original: You are currently using the free edition of Talkie, and a limited set of features is available. Have you considered upgrading to Talkie Premium?

frontend_featuresEdition_Premium.message: Kwa sasa unatumia Talkie Premium , na vipengele vyote vinapatikana. Asante sana, inafurahisha moyo wangu!
frontend_featuresEdition_Premium.original: You are currently using Talkie Premium, and all features are available. Thank you very much, it warms my heart!

frontend_featuresEditions.message: Talkie huja katika matoleo mawili: Talkie na Talkie Premium. Toleo la bure ni nzuri kwa matukio mengi ya matumizi, lakini toleo la malipo hutoa chaguo na vipengele vya ziada.
frontend_featuresEditions.original: Talkie comes in two editions: Talkie and Talkie Premium. The free edition is great for most use cases, but the premium edition offers additional options and features.

frontend_featuresFree_List03.message: Husoma maandishi yaliyochaguliwa kwa kubofya kitufe, ufunguo wa njia ya mkato, au menyu ya kubofya kulia.
frontend_featuresFree_List03.original: Reads selected text by a button click, shortcut key, or right-click menu.

frontend_featuresFree_List04.message: Husoma maandishi marefu na makala kwa sauti kubwa, hata kichupo kikiwa chinichini.
frontend_featuresFree_List04.original: Reads long texts and articles out loud, even while the tab is in the background.

frontend_featuresFree_List05.message: Nambari ni chanzo wazi na inapatikana kwa watumiaji wote.
frontend_featuresFree_List05.original: Code is open source and fully available to all users.

frontend_featuresFree_List06.message: Tumia kadri unavyotaka bila gharama yoyote.
frontend_featuresFree_List06.original: Use as much as you want at no cost.

frontend_featuresPremium_List01.message: Chagua sauti yako mwenyewe unayopendelea kwa kila lugha.
frontend_featuresPremium_List01.original: Choose your own preferred voice for each language.

frontend_featuresPremium_List02.message: Rekebisha kasi ya kusoma na sauti kwa kila sauti.
frontend_featuresPremium_List02.original: Adjust reading speed and pitch per voice.

frontend_featuresPremium_List03.message: Hisia hiyo ya joto na ya fuzzy unayopata unapounga mkono programu huria na wasanidi huru.
frontend_featuresPremium_List03.original: That warm, fuzzy feeling you get when supporting open source software by independent developers.

frontend_featuresPremium_List04.message: Premium yanajumuishwa bila gharama ya ziada.
frontend_featuresPremium_List04.original: Future Premium updates included without additional cost.

frontend_featuresPremium_List05.message: Ongea maandishi kutoka kwenye ubao wa kunakili. Nakili maandishi yoyote kutoka popote katika programu yoyote, na utumie Talkie Premium kuisoma.
frontend_featuresPremium_List05.original: Speak text from the clipboard. Copy any text from anywhere in any program, and use Talkie Premium to read it.

frontend_installVoicesNoVoiceFound.message: Haikuweza kupata sauti zozote za maandishi-hadi-hotuba. Bila sauti Talkie haiwezi kufanya kazi ipasavyo. Wakati mwingine husaidia kupakia upya ukurasa huu, angalau ikiwa kivinjari ni polepole au kuna sauti nyingi.
frontend_installVoicesNoVoiceFound.original: Could not find any text-to-speech voices. Without voices Talkie can not function correctly. Sometimes it helps to reload this page, at least if the browser is slow or there are many voices.

frontend_licenseCLADescription.message: Michango yote kwa Talkie inafanywa chini ya Makubaliano ya Leseni ya Mchangiaji (CLA).
frontend_licenseCLADescription.original: All contributions to Talkie are made under the Contributor License Agreement (CLA).

frontend_settingsReadClipboardDisplayCli.message: Onyesha maandishi ya ubao wa kunakili

frontend_settingsReadClipboardPermission.message: Ufikiaji wa Ubao wa kunakili haujatolewa.
Kataa ruhusa ya ubao wa kunakili

Ili kuzungumza maandishi kutoka kwa programu yoyote, unaweza kunakili maandishi kwenye ubao wa kunakili na kutumia njia ya mkato ya kibodi inayoweza kusanidiwa. Ili Talkie kufikia ubao wa kunakili unahitaji kutoa kibali kwanza. Hiki ni kipengele cha Talkie Premium .
frontend_settingsReadClipboardPermission.original: To speak text from any program, you can copy text to the clipboard and use the configurable keyboard shortcut. For Talkie to access the clipboard you need to grant permission first. This is a Talkie Premium feature.

frontend_settingsReadClipboardPermission.message: Toa au kataa ruhusa yako wakati wowote. Kivinjari chako kinaweza kukuuliza au kisikuulize kuthibitisha.
frontend_settingsReadClipboardPermission.original: Grant or deny your permission any time. Your browser may or may not ask you to confirm.

frontend_settingsReadClipboardPermission.message: Idhini ya Ubao wa kunakili imetolewa.
Ruhusa ya kufikia ubao wa kunakili
Ufikiaji wa ubao wa kunakili haujulikani au haufaulu.

frontend_settingsReadClipboardSpeakClipb.message: Ongea maandishi ya ubao wa kunakili

frontend_settingsReadClipboardTextCouldN.message: Maandishi ya Ubao wa kunakili hayakuweza kusomeka.
frontend_settingsReadClipboardTextCouldN.original: Clipboard text could not be read.

frontend_settingsReadClipboardTextCouldR.message: Maandishi ya Ubao wa kunakili yanaweza kusomeka.

frontend_settingsReadClipboardTextNotYet.message: Maandishi ya Ubao wa kunakili hayajasomwa.
frontend_settingsReadClipboardTextNotYet.original: Clipboard text has not been read.

frontend_storyDescription.message: Talkie ilitengenezwa siku chache kabla ya Mwaka Mpya 2016/2017, kwa changamoto kutoka kwa rafiki. Changamoto ilianza na swali: wakati wa kusafiri kwenda kazini, je, inawezekana kusikiliza makala badala ya kuisoma? Rahisi, nilisema, na nimeamua kuthibitisha hilo — au angalau kufanya kivinjari changu kiongee maandishi kwa kutumia sauti ya kipuuzi ya kompyuta. Toleo la msingi, bila kiolesura chochote cha mtumiaji, liligeuka kuwa dogo kuunda. Kuongeza kiolesura cha mtumiaji, kulichukua muda mrefu zaidi. Kuongeza utambuzi sahihi wa lugha msimbo mwingi zaidi. Kushinda mende katika kivinjari kazi zaidi. Orodha ya maboresho na vipengele inaendelea — na mistari elfu chache ya msimbo baadaye, unatazama matokeo ya mwisho.
frontend_storyDescription.original: Talkie was developed a few days before the New Year 2016/2017, on a challenge from a friend. The challenge started with the question: while commuting to work, is it possible to listen to an article instead of reading it? Easy, I said, and set out to prove it — or at least to make my browser speak out text using a silly computer voice. The basic edition, without any user interface, turned out to be trivial to create. Adding a user interface, took a bit longer. Adding proper language detection a bunch more code. Overcoming bugs in the browser even more work. The list of improvements and features goes on — and a few thousand lines of code later, you're looking at the end result.

frontend_storyThankYou.message: Asante kwa kutumia Talkie — ukiipenda, waambie marafiki zako!
frontend_storyThankYou.original: Thank you for using Talkie — if you like it, tell your friends!

frontend_supportDescription.message: Kwa usaidizi wa haraka na rahisi, tafadhali angalia maswali na majibu haya ya kawaida. Ikiwa swali lako bado halijajibiwa, tafadhali wasiliana nami.
frontend_supportDescription.original: For quick and easy support, please look through these common questions and answers. If your question is still not answered, please contact me.

frontend_systemTalkieUILanguageHeading.message: Talkie lugha ya kiolesura cha mtumiaji

frontend_systemTalkieUILanguagesHeading.message: Talkie lugha za kiolesura cha mtumiaji

frontend_upgradeExplanation01.message: Bei ya Talkie Premium haijapangwa. Badala yake unachangia unachotaka, kulingana na ni kiasi gani unafikiri vipengele vya malipo vina thamani kwako. Unaweza hata kuamua kutoa chochote.
frontend_upgradeExplanation01.original: The price for Talkie Premium is not fixed. Instead you donate what you want, depending on how much you think the premium features are worth to you. You can even decide to donate nothing.

frontend_upgradeExplanation02.message: Baada ya kuchangia hakuna misimbo ya uboreshaji ya kuingiza, hakuna akaunti za mtumiaji za kusajili, au uthibitishaji mwingine wowote wa mchango. Badala yake Talkie Premium hutumia mfumo wa heshima.
frontend_upgradeExplanation02.original: After donating there are no upgrade codes to enter, no user accounts to register, or any other donation verification in place. Instead Talkie Premium uses the honor system.

frontend_upgradeExplanation03.message: Talkie haina utangazaji wowote, ufuatiliaji wa watumiaji au ukusanyaji wa data kama njia mbadala ya uchumaji wa mapato. Michango imeainishwa kama takrima kwa uundaji wa programu huria.
frontend_upgradeExplanation03.original: Talkie does not have any advertising, user tracking, or data collection as alternate means of monetization. Donations are labeled as gratuity for open source software development.

frontend_upgradeHeading.message: Pata toleo jipya la Talkie Premium

frontend_upgradeLabel.message: Pata toleo jipya la Talkie Premium

frontend_usageSelectionContextMenuDescri.message: Unaweza pia kuchagua maandishi, kisha ubofye kulia juu yake, na uchague Talkie kwenye menyu. Njia hii pia inafanya kazi katika faili za PDF na aina maalum za kurasa kwenye kivinjari.
frontend_usageSelectionContextMenuDescri.original: You can also select the text, then right click on it, and choose Talkie in the menu. This way also works in PDF-files and some special types of pages in the browser.

frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative03.message: Hizi ndizo funguo za njia za mkato zilizopendekezwa, ambazo zinaweza kubadilishwa kutoka kwa ukurasa wa mipangilio ya kiendelezi wa kivinjari chako.
frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative03.original: These are the suggested shortcut keys, which can be changed from the extension settings page of your browser.

frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative04.message: Ni kawaida kuwa kuna migogoro kati ya mikato ya kibodi ya upanuzi tofauti na programu. Ikiwa ufunguo wa njia ya mkato haufanyi kazi, tafadhali hakikisha kuwa haujasanidiwa tayari kwa kitu kingine.
frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative04.original: It is common that there are conflicts between the keyboard shortcuts of different extensions and programs. If a shortcut key does not work, please make sure that it is not already configured for something else.

frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative05.message: Angalia au ubadilishe Talkie vitufe vya njia ya mkato.
frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative05.original: Check or change the Talkie shortcut keys.

frontend_usageShortcutKeyDescription.message: Chaguo rahisi ni kutumia Talkie vitufe vya njia ya mkato:
frontend_usageShortcutKeyDescription.original: A convenient option is to use the Talkie shortcut keys:

frontend_usageShortcutKeyDescriptionSpea.message: Ongea maandishi moja kwa moja kutoka kwenye ubao wa kunakili
frontend_usageShortcutKeyDescriptionSpea.original: Speak text directly from the clipboard

frontend_usageSpeakFromClipboard.message: Zungumza maandishi yoyote yaliyonakiliwa kwenye ubao wako wa kunakili, kwa kutumia sauti ulizoweka. Njia rahisi ni kutumia ufunguo wa njia ya mkato unaoweza kusanidiwa. Unaweza pia kubofya kulia kwenye kitufe cha Talkie Premium , au katika eneo tupu la tovuti, na uchague kuzungumza kutoka kwenye ubao wa kunakili.
frontend_usageSpeakFromClipboard.original: Speak any text copied to your clipboard, using your configured voices. The easiest way is to use a configurable shortcut key. You can also right-click on the Talkie Premium button, or in an empty area of a website, and select speak from clipboard.

frontend_usageStep01.message: Chagua maandishi unayotaka kwenye ukurasa wowote wa wavuti.
frontend_usageStep01.original: Select desired text on any web page.

frontend_usageStep02.message: Bofya Talkie katika upau wa vidhibiti wa kivinjari chako
frontend_usageStep02.original: Click the Talkie button in your browser toolbar

frontend_voicesContinueOnTabExplanation0.message: Talkie inaweza kutumika kusoma maandishi yaliyochaguliwa kwenye ukurasa. Wakati ukurasa umefungwa au anwani ya ukurasa inabadilika, Talkie inaweza kuendelea kuzungumza au kuacha kiotomatiki.
frontend_voicesContinueOnTabExplanation0.original: Talkie can be used to read the selected text on a page. When the page is closed or the page address changes, Talkie can either continue speaking or automatically stop.

frontend_voicesContinueOnTabRemovedExpla.message: Wakati kichupo au dirisha imefungwa, Talkie inaweza kuendelea kuzungumza au kuacha kiotomatiki.
frontend_voicesContinueOnTabRemovedExpla.original: When the tab or window is closed, Talkie can either continue speaking or automatically stop.

frontend_voicesContinueOnTabRemovedLabel.original: Continue speaking when the tab is closed

frontend_voicesContinueOnTabUpdatedUrlEx.message: Mabadiliko ya anwani hufanyika kimsingi wakati wa kubofya kiungo ili kwenda kwenye ukurasa mwingine, au unapoandika mwenyewe kwenye upau wa anwani. Tovuti fulani pia zinaweza kubadilisha anwani katika hali zingine, kwa mfano wakati wa kupakia maelezo ya ziada.
frontend_voicesContinueOnTabUpdatedUrlEx.original: Address changes happen primarily when clicking a link to go to another page, or when manually typing in the address bar. Certain websites may also change the address in other cases, for example when loading additional information.

frontend_voicesContinueOnTabUpdatedUrlEx.message: Wakati anwani ya ukurasa inabadilika, Talkie inaweza kuendelea kuzungumza au kuacha kiotomatiki.
frontend_voicesContinueOnTabUpdatedUrlEx.original: When the page address changes, Talkie can either continue speaking or automatically stop.

frontend_voicesContinueOnTabUpdatedUrlFi.message: Kwa sababu za faragha, Firefox ya Mozilla hairipoti kila wakati anwani ya ukurasa inapobadilika. Kuzima mpangilio huu kunaweza kusiwe na athari yoyote.
frontend_voicesContinueOnTabUpdatedUrlFi.original: For privacy reasons, Mozilla Firefox does not always report when the page address changes. Disabling this setting may not have any effect.

frontend_voicesContinueOnTabUpdatedUrlLa.original: Continue speaking when the address changes

frontend_voicesDefaultVoiceForDialect.original: The default voice for the dialect $LANGUAGE_CODE$ is $VOICE$.

frontend_voicesDefaultVoiceForLanguage.original: The default voice for the language $LANGUAGE_GROUP$ is $VOICE$.

frontend_voicesDescription.message: Tazama na ujaribu sauti zilizosakinishwa kwa kila lugha kwenye kivinjari chako. Talkie Premium wanaweza pia kuchagua sauti wanayopenda kama chaguomsingi kwa kila lugha, na pia kuweka kasi na sauti kwa kila sauti.
frontend_voicesDescription.original: See and test installed voices for each language in your browser. Talkie Premium users can also select their favorite voice as the default per language, as well as set speed and pitch for each voice.

frontend_voicesListenToVoiceSample.description: The $VOICE$ the name of the voice
frontend_voicesListenToVoiceSample.original: Listen to a voice sample of $VOICE$.

frontend_voicesPitchEmptyHeading.description: The per-voice pitch options heading, without the voice name variable as none has been selected

frontend_voicesPitchHeading.description: The per-voice pitch options heading, including the voice name

frontend_voicesRateEmptyHeading.description: The per-voice speed options heading, without the voice name variable as none has been selected

frontend_voicesRateHeading.description: The per-voice speed options heading, including the voice name

frontend_voicesSampleText.description: The original sentence is a popuplar English pangram. Translators are encouraged to use pangrams in their own languages. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pangram
frontend_voicesSampleText.message: Mbweha wa kahawia haraka anaruka juu ya mbwa mvivu.
frontend_voicesSampleText.original: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

frontend_voicesSetAsLanguageUseVoiceAsDe.description: The $LANGUAGE$ is the name (or ISO 639 code such as sv or sv-SE) of the language, the $VOICE$ the name of the voice
frontend_voicesSetAsLanguageUseVoiceAsDe.message: Tumia $VOICE$ kama sauti chaguomsingi kwa maandishi katika $LANGUAGE$
frontend_voicesSetAsLanguageUseVoiceAsDe.original: Use $VOICE$ as default voice for text in $LANGUAGE$

frontend_voicesShowAdditionalDetailsExpl.message: Ili kuondoa kiolesura cha mtumiaji, baadhi ya maelezo hayaonyeshwi kwa chaguo-msingi. Ukiwezesha chaguo hili, maelezo ya ziada yataonyeshwa.
frontend_voicesShowAdditionalDetailsExpl.original: To unclutter the user interface, some details are not shown by default. If you enable this option, additional information will be shown.

frontend_voicesShowAdditionalDetailsExpl.message: Hii inajumuisha maelezo ya usaidizi kwa vivinjari vingine na mifumo ya uendeshaji.
frontend_voicesShowAdditionalDetailsExpl.original: This includes support information for other browsers and operating systems.

frontend_voicesSpeakLongTextsExplanation.message: Katika baadhi ya vivinjari, haiwezekani kusoma maandishi marefu mfululizo. Talkie hili, Talkie inatanguliza pause ndogo kati ya sentensi/vifungu na baada ya viakifishi vingine.
frontend_voicesSpeakLongTextsExplanation.original: In some browsers, it is not possible to read long texts continuously. To work around this, Talkie introduces a small pause between sentences/clauses and after other punctuation.

frontend_voicesSpeakLongTextsExplanation.message: Ukiwezesha chaguo hili na kusoma maandishi marefu kutakoma baada ya sekunde 10-20, tafadhali izima tena.
frontend_voicesSpeakLongTextsExplanation.original: If you enable this option and reading long texts stops after 10-20 seconds, please disable it again.

frontend_voicesSpeakingHistoryForgetAllH.message: Kusahau maingizo ya historia ya mtu binafsi

frontend_voicesSpeakingHistoryLimitExpla.message: Talkie inaweza kukumbuka maandishi yaliyotamkwa hapo awali, kwa hivyo inaweza kuchezwa tena baadaye. Mpangilio huu unaweka kikomo idadi ya maingizo ya historia yanakumbukwa.
frontend_voicesSpeakingHistoryLimitExpla.original: Talkie can remember previously spoken text, so it can be replayed later. This setting limits how many history entries are remembered.

frontend_voicesSpeakingHistoryLimitExpla.message: Punguza kikomo ili kupunguza mara moja idadi ya maingizo ya historia. Kikomo cha 0 huzima kukumbuka historia. Kikomo chaguomsingi ni $DEFAULT_LIMIT$ .
frontend_voicesSpeakingHistoryLimitExpla.original: Lower the limit to instantly reduce the number of history entries. A limit of 0 disables remembering the history. The default limit is $DEFAULT_LIMIT$.

frontend_voicesSpeakingHistoryLimitExpla.message: Kwa sasa kuna maingizo $HISTORY_COUNT$ ya historia yanayokumbukwa. Unaweza kusahau yote mara moja, au kusahau maingizo ya mtu binafsi.
frontend_voicesSpeakingHistoryLimitExpla.original: There are currently $HISTORY_COUNT$ history entries remembered. You can forget all at once, or forget individual entries.

frontend_voicesTalkiePremiumPitch.message: Ukiwa na Talkie Premium unaweza kubadilisha sauti chaguomsingi kwa kila lugha, pamoja na sauti na sauti kwa kila sauti.
frontend_voicesTalkiePremiumPitch.original: With Talkie Premium you can change the default voice for each language, as well as voice and pitch for each voice.

frontend_voicesVoiceIsOnline.message: $VOICE$ ni sauti ya mtandaoni. Huenda ikahitaji muunganisho wa intaneti unaotumika ili kufikia huduma za watu wengine.
frontend_voicesVoiceIsOnline.original: $VOICE$ is an online voice. Usage may require an active internet connection to access third-party services.

frontend_welcomeHero01.message: Karibu kwa $NAME$! Sasa unatumia mojawapo ya viendelezi bora vya kivinjari vya kubadilisha maandishi hadi usemi duniani.
frontend_welcomeHero01.original: Welcome to $NAME$! You are now using one of the best text-to-speech browser extensions in the world.

frontend_welcomeHero02.message: Chagua maandishi haya, kisha ubofye kitufe cha $NAME$ katika upau wa vidhibiti wa kivinjari.
frontend_welcomeHero02.original: Select this text, then click the $NAME$ button in the browser toolbar.

frontend_welcomeInstallMoreVoicesDescrip.message: Talkie kwa sasa inaweza kupata sauti $VOICES_COUNT$ zilizosakinishwa, na kuwezesha lugha $LANGUAGE_GROUPS_COUNT$ katika lahaja $LANGUAGES_COUNT$ .
frontend_welcomeInstallMoreVoicesDescrip.original: Talkie can currently find $VOICES_COUNT$ voices installed, enabling $LANGUAGE_GROUPS_COUNT$ languages in $LANGUAGES_COUNT$ dialects.

noTextSelectedMessage.message: Tafadhali chagua maandishi unayotaka kwenye tovuti kwanza. Unaweza pia kuchagua maandishi, kisha ubofye kulia juu yake, na uchague Talkie kwenye menyu.
noTextSelectedMessage.original: Please select desired text on the website first. You can also select text, then right click on it, and choose Talkie in the menu.

notAbleToSpeakTextFromThisSpecialTab.description: Some tabs can't be accessed by WebExtensions, such as chrome:// and the Chrome Web Store/Firefox Add-ons. This message warns users.
notAbleToSpeakTextFromThisSpecialTab.message: Talkie haiwezi kufikia maandishi yaliyochaguliwa kutoka kwa aina hii ya ukurasa. Ni ukurasa maalum sana, na kuna vikwazo vya usalama vilivyowekwa na kivinjari. Unaweza pia kujaribu kuchagua maandishi, kisha ubofye kulia juu yake, na uchague Talkie kwenye menyu. Samahani kwa usumbufu.
notAbleToSpeakTextFromThisSpecialTab.original: Talkie cannot access the selected text from this type of page. It is a very special page, and there are security limitations put in by the browser. You can also try to select text, then right click on it, and choose Talkie in the menu. I'm sorry for the inconvenience.

readClipboardIsAPremiumFeature.message: Samahani, lakini kuongea maandishi kutoka kwenye ubao wa kunakili ni kipengele cha Talkie Premium. Je, umefikiria kuboresha?
readClipboardIsAPremiumFeature.original: I'm sorry, but speaking text from the clipboard is a Talkie Premium feature. Have you considered upgrading?

readClipboardNeedsBrowserSupport.message: Samahani, lakini kivinjari hiki hakionekani kuauni kufikia ubao wa kunakili.
readClipboardNeedsBrowserSupport.original: I'm sorry, but this browser does not seem to support accessing the clipboard.

readClipboardNeedsPermission.message: Talkie haina ruhusa ya kufikia ubao wa kunakili. Unaweza kutoa ruhusa kwenye ukurasa wa chaguzi za Talkie .
readClipboardNeedsPermission.original: Talkie does not have permission to access the clipboard. You may grant permission on the Talkie options page.

readClipboardNoSuitableText.message: Haikuweza kupata maandishi yanayofaa kwenye ubao wa kunakili. Je, unaweza kujaribu kunakili kitu kingine?
readClipboardNoSuitableText.original: Could not find suitable text in the clipboard. Can you try copying something else?
